content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, -18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 2.5, -18.5), boiler (position 2.5, -17.5) and offshore pump (position 2.5, -16.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position(1, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 1) and a furnace at position(1, 1)
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 2) and a furnace at position(1, 2)

### Copper cable factory at position(1, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position(1, 0)
- Assembling machine at position(2, 0) and inserter at position(2, 1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 1) that connects the furnace at position 1, 0 to assembling machine at position(2, 0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to connect to electric poles
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities. In this case, you need small electric poles which require wood and copper cables.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
